data.text: @charliebilello You just take the antiviral pill now. It was there all along.
@charliebilello thank you doctor.  let it gooooooooo

Will there be another wave? Yes. Covid-19 is endemic and will be with us forever. But the combination of natural & vaccine immunity (my estimation: >95% of US population is either vaccinated or has had the virus) should continue to lead to much lower fatality rates.
@charliebilello Based on the trend, next peak will be June 2022
@charliebilello It's beyond me that no major governments have consulted Uttar Pradesh (the most populous Indian state w/ ~240M people) on how they successfully fought Covid https://t.co/K0Rap9J3bu
